dunes-script-module.name: ucpassignResourceExtensionsToEntitlement
dunes-script-module.description: Assigns resource extensions to an entitlement. Resource extensions are immediate actions that do not create requests and are always run immediately on the provisioned item.
dunes-script-module.param: Entitlement to assign resource extensions to
Extensions to assign to the entitlement
